DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , blind , parallel group , placebo-controlled trial 32 evaluable healthy male non-pregnant female , 18-50 year old volunteer . The investigator goal observe pharmacokinetics fenobam oral administration 50 , 100 150 mg group healthy individual compare side effect tolerability single dose fenobam placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Side Effects mGlu5 Antagonist Fenobam Adult Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Treatment regimen 1 : Fenobam [ 1- ( 3-chlorophenyl ) -3- ( 1-methyl-4-oxo-2-imidazolidinylidine ) urea hydrate ] , oral administration one 50 mg gelatin capsule . Treatment regimen 2 : Fenobam , oral administration one 100 mg gelatin capsule . Treatment regimen 3 : Fenobam , oral administration one 150 mg gelatin capsule . Treatment regimen 4 : Placebo ( lactose ) , oral administration one 150 mg gelatin capsule .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . 1850 yr old 2 . Good general health remarkable medical condition ( e.g liver , kidney , heart , lung failure ) , BMI < 33 know drug allergy . 3 . Willing comply study guideline outline protocol 4 . Willing provide inform consent . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Medication use ( prescription non prescription medication , vitamin , herbal , dietary mineral supplement grapefruit product within 14 day prior study participation ; excludes contraceptive ) 2 . History addiction drug alcohol ( prior present addiction treatment addiction ) 3 . Pregnant nursing female 4 . Lactose intolerance 5 . Smokers
